goldenTasks.name: Simple SaaS Landing Page
goldenTasks.description: Build a minimal SaaS landing page with hero, features, and CTA sections.
goldenTasks.goal: Build a responsive landing page for a project management SaaS tool called 'TaskFlow'. Include hero section with headline and CTA, features section with 3 feature cards, pricing section, and footer. Brand colors: #2563EB, #1E40AF, #FFFFFF.
goldenTasks.expectedOutcome: Complete HTML/CSS landing page with all required sections

goldenTasks.name: E-commerce Product Page
goldenTasks.description: Build a product landing page with image gallery, description, and purchase CTA.
goldenTasks.goal: Build a product landing page for premium wireless headphones. Include product image hero, key specs list, customer reviews section, and 'Buy Now' CTA. Brand colors: #18181B, #F59E0B, #FAFAFA.
goldenTasks.expectedOutcome: Complete product page with responsive layout

goldenTasks.name: Portfolio Landing Page
goldenTasks.description: Build a creative portfolio page with project gallery.
goldenTasks.goal: Build a portfolio landing page for a UI designer. Include about section, project gallery with 4 project cards, skills section, and contact form. Brand colors: #7C3AED, #A78BFA, #1F2937.
goldenTasks.expectedOutcome: Complete portfolio page with grid layout
